item.title: [317]santa hat red party hat and buny ears turns your into npc tut![317]
item.dc:creator: @joepkz2008 joepkz2008
item.description:
@joepkz2008 wrote:

Purpose: To have some fun with items and npcs pritty funny

Difficulty: 1/10 Just read and understand

Source tested on: all-star.scape.

[b]1.[b]this is for the santa

[b]2.[b] go into client.java.[b]search public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) { then underneath it add .

if (wearID == 1050) { npcId = 1552; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } .

[b]3.[b]this is the party pete.

[b]4.[b]just do the same just under neath the santa one add

if (wearID == 1038) { npcId = 659; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

[[b]5.[b]this is the one for easter bunny.

if ((playerItems[slot] - 1) == wearID) { if (wearID == 6070) { npcId = 1645; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

[b]6.[b] Finally, Save & Compile and the run and use them .

I hope this helped.

comment if i got something rong please help me dont start giving me abuse

Thanks,
joepkz2008
100% me

Read full topic
